mapper.insert: insert into ${prefix}ACT_ID_GROUP (ID_, REV_, NAME_, TYPE_) values ( #{id ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 1, #{name ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type ,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into ${prefix}ACT_ID_GROUP (ID_, REV_, NAME_, TYPE_) values
(#{group.id ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 1, #{group.name ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{group.type ,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

INSERT ALL
INTO ${prefix}ACT_ID_GROUP (ID_, REV_, NAME_, TYPE_) VALUES (#{group.id ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 1, #{group.name ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{group.type ,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
SELECT * FROM dual
mapper.delete: delete from ${prefix}ACT_ID_GROUP where ID_ = #{id} and REV_ = #{revision}
mapper.select: select g.* from ${prefix}ACT_ID_GROUP g, ${prefix}ACT_ID_MEMBERSHIP membership where g.ID_ = membership.GROUP_ID_ and membership.USER_ID_ = #{parameter}

select RES.* from ${prefix}ACT_ID_GROUP RES inner join ${prefix}ACT_ID_PRIV_MAPPING MAPPING on MAPPING.GROUP_ID_ = RES.ID_ inner join ${prefix}ACT_ID_PRIV PRIV on PRIV.ID_ = MAPPING.PRIV_ID_ where PRIV.ID_ = #{parameter} order by RES.NAME_
